https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fC5mMi6BuFyinR4qFf1LH05UAIy.jpg Three years after simultaneously parting with a philanderer husband and experiencing a dramatic fall during a horse jumping contest, Alexandra Balzan, a Parisian architect, regains an appetite for life and love after a chance encounter with an aging misanthrope of a master horseman and his horse Dance with Him
